S06pvspl_u:1_1_0: namas sarvajñāya // evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma
S06pvspl_u:1_1_1: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasrais sarvair
S06pvspl_u:1_1_2: arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06pvspl_u:1_1_3: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_1_5: pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair
S06pvspl_u:1_1_6: anekaiś ca bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_1_8: asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair alapakair apagatajñātṛlābhacittaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_2_0: / tadyathā badhrapālena ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnākareṇa ca susārthavāhena
S06pvspl_u:1_2_1: ca naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca guhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca
S06pvspl_u:1_2_2: viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇa
S06pvspl_u:1_2_3: ca nityodyuktena ca nityaprayuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamamatinā
S06pvspl_u:1_2_4: ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena
S06pvspl_u:1_2_5: ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena /
S06pvspl_u:1_4_0: / atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam ābhujya
S06pvspl_u:1_4_1: ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhānyā (PvSPL kā_a) abhūvan* sarvakṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan* ye ca satvās
S06pvspl_u:1_4_2: tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante
S06pvspl_u:1_4_3: sma te devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma anusmṛtya
S06pvspl_u:1_4_4: tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas teṣām antikam
S06pvspl_u:1_4_5: upasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṅ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo
S06pvspl_u:1_4_6: bhūtvā tān buddhān bhagavato namasyanti sma /
S06pvspl_u:1_5_0: / atha khalu tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:1_5_1: andhās satvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāñ cchṛṇvanti
S06pvspl_u:1_5_2: sma unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā bhavanti sma nagnāś
S06pvspl_u:1_5_3: cīvaraprāvṛtā bhavanti sma jighatsitāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhavanti sma tṛṣitāḥ vigatapipāsā
S06pvspl_u:1_5_4: bhavanti sma rogaspṛṣṭāḥ vigatarogā bhavanti sma hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti
S06pvspl_u:1_5_6: bhavanti sma sarvasatvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma bhrātṛbhaginī samacittā
S06pvspl_u:1_5_7: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma brahmacāriṇaḥ
S06pvspl_u:1_5_8: śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśasukhaṃ pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi
S06pvspl_u:1_5_9: nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñāya samanvāgatā
S06pvspl_u:1_5_10: bhavanti sma yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānam udānayanti sma
S06pvspl_u:1_5_11: sādhu damaḥ sādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhu praṇibhūteṣv
S06pvspl_u:1_6_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva sihāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pvspl_u:1_6_1: lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā
S06pvspl_u:1_6_2: ca pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha-ūrdhvavidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl
S06pvspl_u:1_6_3: lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena
S06pvspl_u:1_7_0: / tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate
S06pvspl_u:1_7_1: tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn
S06pvspl_u:1_7_2: abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca /
S06pvspl_u:1_8: / atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhsaramahāsāhsre lokadhātau satvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa /
S06pvspl_u:1_10_0: lokadhātau śuddhāvāsikāyikā (PvSPL kā_b) devā brahmakāyikāś ca paranirmitavaśavartinaś
S06pvspl_u:1_10_1: ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca
S06pvspl_u:1_10_2: devās te tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā divyagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatraddhvajapatākāś
S06pvspl_u:1_10_3: ca gṛhītvā divyāni cotpalakumudasaugandhikapundarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca kesaratamālapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:1_10_4: gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntā ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06pvspl_u:1_10_5: lokadhātau manuṣyās te pi tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā sthalajajalajāni
S06pvspl_u:1_10_6: puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S06pvspl_u:1_11_0: / atha khalu te devās te ca manuṣyās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatraddhvajapatākābhis
S06pvspl_u:1_11_1: te sthalajajalajaiḥ puṣpais tan tathāgatakāyam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti
S06pvspl_u:1_12_1: sthajajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni sarvāny uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato
S06pvspl_u:1_12_3: tataś ca kūṭāgārād divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante sma pralambante sma abhipralambante
S06pvspl_u:1_12_4: sma taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīva
S06pvspl_u:1_12_5: śobhate sma tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu pravisṛtena
S06pvspl_u:1_12_6: ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan* asmiṃś
S06pvspl_u:1_12_7: ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu lokadhātuṣu devamanuṣyānām*
S06pvspl_u:1_12_8: ekaikasyaitad abhūt* mama puratas tathāgato niṣiṇṇo dharman deśayati mama puratas
S06pvspl_u:1_13_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar api smitam akarot* yena
S06pvspl_u:1_13_1: smitāvabhāsenāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo bhūt* yāvad daśasu dikṣu
S06pvspl_u:1_13_2: gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan* ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:1_13_3: satvāḥ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti
S06pvspl_u:1_13_4: sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:2_0_0: (PvSPL ki_a) gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye satvās te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_0_1: paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:2_0_2: paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha-ūrdhvandigbhāge gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_0_3: buddhān bhagavantaḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye satvās
S06pvspl_u:2_0_4: te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S06pvspl_u:2_1_0: / atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yā
S06pvspl_u:2_1_1: sarvapaścimā lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas
S06pvspl_u:2_1_2: tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānān deśayati atha
S06pvspl_u:2_1_3: tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsan
S06pvspl_u:2_1_4: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālan tañ ca bhagavato secanakam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā
S06pvspl_u:2_1_5: yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
S06pvspl_u:2_1_6: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat*
S06pvspl_u:2_1_7: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_2_0: / evam ukte sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat*
S06pvspl_u:2_2_1: asti kulaputretaḥ paścime digbhāge gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya sahā
S06pvspl_u:2_2_2: nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate
S06pvspl_u:2_2_3: yāpayate sa bodhisatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃprakāśayati tasyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_3_0: / atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvo ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat* gamiṣyāmy
S06pvspl_u:2_3_1: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_3_2: samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvāṇ
S06pvspl_u:2_3_4: darśanāya sa bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasedānīṅ kālaṃ manyase /
S06pvspl_u:2_4_0: / atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:2_4_1: padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisatvāya prādād evañ cāvādīd etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais
S06pvspl_u:2_4_2: saparivāras taṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān*
S06pvspl_u:2_4_3: bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ (PvSPL ki_b)
S06pvspl_u:2_4_4: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatīmāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_4_6: padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti saṃprajānaṅkārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre
S06pvspl_u:2_4_7: bhaves taṅ kasya hetor durāsadā hi te kulaputra bodhisatvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv
S06pvspl_u:2_5_0: / atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvas tasya ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni
S06pvspl_u:2_5_1: nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇy anekair bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair
S06pvspl_u:2_5_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitair dārakair dārikābhiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:2_5_3: teṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu buddhān bhagavatas satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
S06pvspl_u:2_5_5: sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas
S06pvspl_u:2_5_6: tenopasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte 'sthād ekānte
S06pvspl_u:2_5_7: sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisatvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam etad avocat*
S06pvspl_u:2_5_8: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_5_9: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchatīmāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_5_10: tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_6_0: / atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyān
S06pvspl_u:2_6_1: diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_6_2: sphuṭā abhūvan* teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dharman
S06pvspl_u:2_6_3: deśayanti sma yad utemam eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ yaiś ca satvais sa dharmaś
S06pvspl_u:2_6_4: śrutas te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
S06pvspl_u:2_7_0: / atha khalu ye te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāś ca dārakā dārikāś
S06pvspl_u:2_7_1: ca tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātos samantaraśminā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sārdham āyātās
S06pvspl_u:2_7_2: te svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjya
S06pvspl_u:2_7_3: pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan* ekāntaniṣannāś ca te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās
S06pvspl_u:2_7_4: te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikā bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam etad avocan* ratnākaro
S06pvspl_u:2_7_5: bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ bhagavato 'lpabādhātāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_6: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_7_7: tathāgatena padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas
S06pvspl_u:2_7_8: tāni padmā (PvSPL kham_a) manasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_9: caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhijñājñānasākṣātkriyā dānam abhinirharati sa divyena cakṣuṣā
S06pvspl_u:2_7_10: viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvān paśyati cyavamānān upapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān
S06pvspl_u:2_7_11: hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān yathākarmopagān satvān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī
S06pvspl_u:2_7_12: bhavantas satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāgduścaritena samanvāgatā manoduścaritena
S06pvspl_u:2_7_13: samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya
S06pvspl_u:2_7_14: bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātan narakeṣūpapadyante amī punar bhavantas
S06pvspl_u:2_7_15: satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāksucaritena manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām
S06pvspl_u:2_7_16: anapavādakās samyagdṛṣṭikās te samyagdṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_17: maraṇāt sugatau svargaloka upapadyanta iti divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa
S06pvspl_u:2_7_18: daśa diśi loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvalokadhātuṣu ṣaḍgatikānāṃ satvānāñ cyutopapādaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_7_19: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tena ca divyena cakṣuṣā na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur
S06pvspl_u:2_7_20: acintyatām upādāya yo 'haṃ paśyāmīti na manyate sa tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām
S06pvspl_u:2_7_21: upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānutpattikām upādāya sa divyacakṣuścetanām
S06pvspl_u:2_7_22: api notpādayati na divyacakṣurabhinirhāracetanām anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād
S06pvspl_u:2_8_0: śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam
S06pvspl_u:2_8_1: abhinirharati sa āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati na śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_8_2: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati nāpy anyaṅ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsamāno 'nyatrānuttarāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_8_4: na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na
S06pvspl_u:2_8_5: manyate sa tad eva jñānan nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām
S06pvspl_u:2_8_6: upādāya svabhāvopalabdhitām upādāya āsravakṣayajñānacetanām api notādayati nāsravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānabhinirhāracetanām
S06pvspl_u:2_8_7: anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_8_8: caran nāśravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānam abhinirharaty evaṃ punaś śāriputra bodhisatvasya
S06pvspl_u:2_8_9: mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataṣ ṣaḍabhijnāḥ paripūrayante pariśuddhyanti cābhijñāḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_9_0: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_9_1: sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhanyanti atyantaśūnyatayā (PvSPL kham_b) anavagṛhītatām
S06pvspl_u:2_10: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaś śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā anaddhyāpattitām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_11: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā akṣobhaṇatām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_12_0: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_13: / santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā avikṣiptacittām upādāya /
S06pvspl_u:2_14_0: / santi śāriputrā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ
S06pvspl_u:2_14_1: śodhayanti dauṣprajñyacittaparivarjanatām upādāya evaṅ khalu śāriputra bodhisatvā
S06pvspl_u:2_14_2: mahāsatvāṣ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā
S06pvspl_u:2_14_3: agamanānāgamanatām upādāyāparigrahatām upādāya tat kasya hetor dānam āgraham upādāya
S06pvspl_u:2_14_4: prajñapyate śīlan dauḥśīlyatām upādāya kṣāntir akṣāntim upādāya vīryaṅ kausīdyam
S06pvspl_u:2_14_5: upādāya samādhir asamāhitatām upādāya prajñā dauṣprajñyam upādāya prajñapyate sa
S06pvspl_u:2_14_6: tīrṇa iti na manyate atīrṇa iti na manyate dānaṃ mātsaryam iti na manyate śīlan dauḥśīlyam
S06pvspl_u:2_14_7: iti kṣāntiḥ kṣobha iti vīryaṃ kausīdyam iti samādhir asamāhitateti prajñā duṣprajñateti
S06pvspl_u:2_14_8: na manyate vindako 'ham iti na manyate satkṛta iti na manyate asatkṛta iti na manyate
S06pvspl_u:2_14_9: tat kasya hetor na hi śāriputrānutpāda ākṛṣṭo 'ham iti manyate na vandito 'ham iti
S06pvspl_u:2_14_10: na satkṛto 'ham iti nāsatkṛto 'ham iti manyate tat kasya hetos tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
S06pvspl_u:2_14_11: sarvamanyanās samucchinattīha śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya
S06pvspl_u:2_14_12: ye guṇā bhavanti na te śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante /
S06pvspl_u:2_15: / imān guṇān paripūrayan satvānś ca paribhāvayati buddhakṣetrāñ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāñ cānuprāpnoti /
S06pvspl_u:2_16_0: / punar aparañ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran sarvasatvānām
S06pvspl_u:2_16_1: antike samacittatām utpādayati sarvasatvānām antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_16_2: pratilabhate sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhya tasyāṃ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarvasatvān
S06pvspl_u:2_16_3: pratiṣṭhāpayati sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca
S06pvspl_u:2_16_4: sarvabodhisatvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ sarvapratyekabuddhānāñ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś
S06pvspl_u:2_16_5: ca sa yatra (PvSPL khaḥ_a) yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣāmanaāpāni rūpāṇi
S06pvspl_u:2_16_6: paśyati na śrotreṇāmanaāpāñ cchabdāñ cchṛṇoti na ghrāṇenāmanaāpān gandhāñ jighrati
S06pvspl_u:2_16_7: na jihvayāmanaāpān rasān āsvādayati na kāyenāmanaāpān sparśān spṛśati na manasāmanaāpān
S06pvspl_u:2_16_8: dharmān vijānāti na ca parihīyate sarvakārajñatāyāḥ /
S06pvspl_u:2_17_0: / asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ parṣadas trīṇi bhikṣuśatāni
S06pvspl_u:2_17_1: bhagavantaṃ yathāprāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāñ ca samyaksambodhau
S06pvspl_u:2_19_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_19_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratisthāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat
S06pvspl_u:2_19_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukān nāpratyayaṃ buddhā
S06pvspl_u:2_20_0: / bhagavān āha etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuśatāny ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahāketunāmānas
S06pvspl_u:2_20_1: tathāgatā arhantas samyaksambuddhā loka utpatsyante tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutās
S06pvspl_u:2_20_2: santaḥ akṣobḥyasya tathāgatasyārhatas samyaksambuddhasya buddhakṣetra upapatsyante
S06pvspl_u:2_20_3: abhiratyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭiś ca devaputrasahasrāś cāsyāṃ parṣady anayā dharmadeśanayā
S06pvspl_u:2_21_0: / atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalāc catasraḥ parṣado
S06pvspl_u:2_21_1: bhagavato 'nubhāvena pūrvasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān
S06pvspl_u:2_21_2: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyān dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_21_3: paścimottarāyām adha-ūrdhvam ekaikasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti
S06pvspl_u:2_21_4: sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhena na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān
S06pvspl_u:2_22_0: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām // atha khalu bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_22_1: prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni kṛtāni vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair
S06pvspl_u:2_23_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot*
S06pvspl_u:2_23_1: ānanda āha ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayas smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_24_0: / bhagavān āha paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśa prāṇisahasrāṇi ānanda āha paśyāmi bhagavan
S06pvspl_u:2_24_1: bhagavān āha etāny ānanda daśa prāṇisahasrāṇītaś cyutāni daśasu dikṣv eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyante
S06pvspl_u:2_24_2: na ca kadācit tathāgatavirahitā bhaviṣyanti tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas tathāgatā
S06pvspl_u:2_25_0: / atha khalu āyuṣmāñ cchāriputra (PvSPL khaḥ_b) āyuṣmāñ ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_25_1: ca subhūtir āyuṣmāñ ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmāñ ca mahākāśyapa ete cānye ca
S06pvspl_u:2_25_2: sambahulā abhijñātābhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisatvāś ca mahāsatvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāś
S06pvspl_u:2_25_3: ca bhagavantam etad avocan mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavann udārapāramiteyaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_25_4: mahāsatvānān yad uta prajñāpāramitā agrapāramiteyaṃ viśiṣṭapāramiteyaṃ parapāramiteyaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_25_8: yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ caradbhir bodhisatvair
S06pvspl_u:2_25_9: mahāsatvair asamasaman dānan dattan tair asamasamā dānapāramitā paripūritā tair asamasama
S06pvspl_u:2_25_10: ātmabhāvapratilabdhaye samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti yad utānuttarāyās
S06pvspl_u:2_26_0: / evam asamasamaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryan dhyānam asamasamā prajñā bhāvitā tair asamasamā
S06pvspl_u:2_26_1: prajñāpāramitā paripūritā tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhas te samasamasya dharmasya
S06pvspl_u:2_26_2: lābhino bhaviṣyanti yadutānuttarāyās samyaksambodher atraive ca tvaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_26_3: carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāyā vedanāyās saṃjñāyās saṃskārāṇām
S06pvspl_u:2_26_4: asamasamasya vijñānasya lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāṃ bodhim abhisambuddho samasaman dharmacakraṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_26_5: pravartitavān evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_26_7: ca tasmāt tarhi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgantukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pvspl_u:2_26_8: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaṅkaraṇīyo namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavaṃ bodhisatvā mahāsatvās
S06pvspl_u:2_27_0: / evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān sambahulān mahāśrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān
S06pvspl_u:2_27_1: etad avocad evam etat kulaputrā evam etan namaskaranīyās te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās
S06pvspl_u:2_28_0: / tat kasya hetor bodhisatvam* kulaputrā mahāsatvam āgamya manuṣyalokasya loke prādurbhāvo
S06pvspl_u:2_28_1: bhavaty evan devalokasya kṣatriyamahāsālakulānāṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakulānān gṛhapatimahāsālakulānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_2: rājñāñ cakravartināñ cāturmahārājikānān devānān trāyastriṅśānāṃ yāmānān tuṣitānān
S06pvspl_u:2_28_4: mahābrahmaṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām (PvSPL ga_a)
S06pvspl_u:2_28_5: apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisatvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_6: sudarśanānām aspṛhāṇām atapānām akaniṣṭhānāñ cākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānām
S06pvspl_u:2_28_8: bhavati srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhataṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_9: mahāsatvānān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_10: mahāsatvam āgamya trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ yad idaṃ buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya
S06pvspl_u:2_28_11: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ laukikānāñ jīvitopakaraṇānām
S06pvspl_u:2_28_13: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati yāvat kulaputrās sarvasukhopadhānānān divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_14: ca bhavasukhānān nirvāṇasukhānāñ ca loke prādurbhāvo bhavati sarvas sa kulaputrā
S06pvspl_u:2_28_15: bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya tat kasya hetos tathā hi kulaputrā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_28_16: prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran satvān* ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu niyojayati dānan dāpayati śīle niyuṅkte
S06pvspl_u:2_28_17: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati vīrye niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati
S06pvspl_u:2_28_18: bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya satvā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranti
S06pvspl_u:2_28_19: te dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvalaukikalokottarās saṃpattīr
S06pvspl_u:2_28_20: anuprāpnuvanti tasmāt tarhi kulaputrā bodhisatvo mahāsatvas sarvasatvānāṃ hitasukhāya
S06pvspl_u:2_29_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāñ jihvendriyaṃ mūkhān nirṇāmyemān trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_29_1: lokadhātuñ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānānvarṇā
S06pvspl_u:2_29_2: arciso niścārya pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn avabhāsayamāsuḥ evan
S06pvspl_u:2_29_3: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ pi dikṣv adha-ūrdhvāyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl
S06pvspl_u:2_30_0: / atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā
S06pvspl_u:2_30_1: bodhisatvā mahāsatvās taṃ prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā svakasvasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān
S06pvspl_u:2_30_2: bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas
S06pvspl_u:2_30_3: sandṛśyante te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrāḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_0: nāma tahāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyaṃ mukhān nirṇāmya daśasu dikṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_31_1: gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena (PvSPL ga_b) sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_2: mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitādeśanāya saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tāṃs
S06pvspl_u:2_31_3: tathāgatān evam āhur gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ bhagavantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_4: śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
S06pvspl_u:2_31_5: tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān darśanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_6: śravaṇāya te buddhā bhagavanta evam āhur yasyedānīṃ kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyaddhva evan
S06pvspl_u:2_31_7: dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha-ūrdhvāyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_31_8: lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisatvā mahāsatvās taṃ prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu
S06pvspl_u:2_31_9: buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavantaḥ paripṛcchanti sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo
S06pvspl_u:2_31_10: yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas sandṛśyate te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān
S06pvspl_u:2_31_11: māhāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrā adhodigbhāge sahāṃyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma
S06pvspl_u:2_31_12: tāthāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyan nirṇāmya daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā
S06pvspl_u:2_31_13: lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitān
S06pvspl_u:2_31_14: deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhur gamiṣyāmo
S06pvspl_u:2_31_15: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun tañ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_31_16: samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān
S06pvspl_u:2_31_17: mahāsatvān darśanāya vandanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya te buddhā bhagavanta
S06pvspl_u:2_31_18: evam āhur yasyedānīṃ kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyadhve /
S06pvspl_u:2_32_0: / atha khalu daśabhyo digbhyas te bodhisatvāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā
S06pvspl_u:2_33_0: / atha khalu cāturmahārājikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamaṇḍāravakesaratamālapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:2_33_1: gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāman* atha khalu te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās te ca
S06pvspl_u:2_33_2: devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddham avakiranti
S06pvspl_u:2_33_3: sma atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi viyad abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor
S06pvspl_u:2_33_4: upariṣṭhāt puṣpavitānāṃ saṃsthitañ caturaśrañ ca catusthūṇaṃ samambhāgaśas suvibhaktaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_33_5: ramaṇīyaṃ manoramaṃ yat puṣpavitānan dṛṣṭvā tato bodhisatvamahāsatvaparṣado devaparṣadaś
S06pvspl_u:2_33_6: ca prāṇikoṭinayutaśatasahasreṇānutpattakeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā ta utthāyāsanebhya
S06pvspl_u:2_33_7: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgān kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06pvspl_u:2_33_8: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocan vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate (PvSPL gā_a)
S06pvspl_u:2_33_9: 'dhvany evaṃrūpāṇān dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ
S06pvspl_u:2_33_10: evañ ca śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pariharema evañ ca parṣadi dharman deśayema yathaitarhi tathāgato
S06pvspl_u:2_34_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣān daśadigabhyāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_35_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṅ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_35_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocat
S06pvspl_u:2_35_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ buddhā
S06pvspl_u:2_35_3: bhagavanta smitam āviṣkurvanti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocad
S06pvspl_u:2_35_5: ete cānāgate 'dhvany aṣṭāṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭibhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantas
S06pvspl_u:2_36_0: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa pratibhātu
S06pvspl_u:2_36_1: te subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya dhārmikīṅ kathāṅ kartuṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_36_2: yathā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto niryāyur iti /
S06pvspl_u:2_37: / atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat* /
S06pvspl_u:2_38: / kin nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty uta buddhānubhāvena /
S06pvspl_u:2_39_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ
S06pvspl_u:2_39_1: ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāñ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_39_2: śāriputram etad avocat tat kiñcid āyuṣmañ cchāriputra bhagavataś śrāvakā bhāṣante
S06pvspl_u:2_39_3: deśayanty udīrayanti sarvas sa tathāgatasya puruṣākāro veditavyas taṅ kasya hetor
S06pvspl_u:2_39_4: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyān dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavataś śrāvakās
S06pvspl_u:2_39_5: tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty
S06pvspl_u:2_39_6: upadiśanti sarvan tad dharmatayā na viruddhyate tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputropāyakauśalyayogena
S06pvspl_u:2_39_7: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty aviṣayo 'trāyuṣmāñ cchāriputra
S06pvspl_u:2_40_0: / atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat* bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti
S06pvspl_u:2_40_1: bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti
S06pvspl_u:2_40_2: vā nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi (PvSPL gā_b) yad uta bodhisatva iti
S06pvspl_u:2_40_3: prajñāpāramiteti vā so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisatvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy
S06pvspl_u:2_40_4: anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisatvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi /
S06pvspl_u:2_41_0: / evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad
S06pvspl_u:2_41_1: uta prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti tad api nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:2_41_2: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathā pi nāma subhūte satvas satva iti nāmnocyate
S06pvspl_u:2_41_3: na ca kadācit satvopalabdhir yac ca nāma tad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptir
S06pvspl_u:2_42_0: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam ātmasatvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajanakapaśyakā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_1: iti subhūte sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo
S06pvspl_u:2_42_2: na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketanamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_3: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva
S06pvspl_u:2_42_4: iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
S06pvspl_u:2_42_5: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān
S06pvspl_u:2_42_6: na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam ādhyātmakaṃ
S06pvspl_u:2_42_7: rūpam iti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na
S06pvspl_u:2_42_8: nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:2_42_9: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram
S06pvspl_u:2_42_10: etad tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:2_42_11: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad
S06pvspl_u:2_42_12: ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etan dharmaprajñaptimātran
S06pvspl_u:2_42_13: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:2_42_14: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate cakṣur iti subhūte
S06pvspl_u:2_42_15: dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
S06pvspl_u:2_42_16: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S06pvspl_u:2_43_0: / evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś
S06pvspl_u:2_43_1: ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra dharmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:2_43_2: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate rūpam iti subhūte
S06pvspl_u:2_43_3: dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
S06pvspl_u:2_43_4: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06pvspl_u:2_44: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyan dharma iti subhūte dharmapra
